name: Mike Dies
description: After flying his spaceship into an asteroid field, Spaceman Mike finds himself fighting for survival against hostile aliens, a ruthless kingpin and his own personal demons. Haunted by his past and hunted by his enemies, can Mike escape in one piece?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or better Processor: AMD Phenom II or equivalent Graphics: Tested with a NVIDIA GeForce GTX 965M - 2GB GDDR5 memory Storage: 2 GB available space
